dataList.content: Haah, huff… Gotcha! Slippery bastard!
The child was backed into a dead end. And, someone was hot on his heels from the other side of the alley.
His pursuer held a long sword with two hands and took deep, slow breaths, looking to tear the child in two at any moment.
There’s… nowhere to run. Hah, so stop wasting my energy ‘n…
While the man giving chase was busy talking…
Hol’ up! Where’d you…
The child rumbled and tumbled, making a loud exit into a gap on the right.
His pursuer mumbles harsh words, slowly moving toward the end of the alley where the child vanished.
An iron door covered in red rust. This must be where the child hid.
Hell’s bells… Thought you were clever, hiding off in a tight space where long weapons’re no good, eh?
Chuckling to himself, the pursuer slid the longer sword into his waistband and took out a shorter blade.
Dumbass, there’s good reason I carry two swords all the time… Keheh.
The iron door is entered with a wicked cackle.
Alas, it was completely unbeknownst that it was a trap.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: I got… you.
Wha?!
The child was nowhere to be found in immediate sight, but he now suddenly looms behind.
It was unbelievable to the thug.
B—But, how…?

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Don’t care if your sword is long or short… No ingredient that’s crawled into my “workroom” has ever made it out alive.
I-Ingredient…?

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Yep. You, pal… have been tricked.
That’s when the pursuer finally realized.
He had chased the child… into the streets of flavor.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: So why’d you start a fight with a random passerby like that… I was just casually strolling, and now you got me curious of your meat quality.
D—Does that mean this is… Ryōshū’s…
The pursuer, now reduced to miserable prey, fearfully murmured.
Even new blood still unfamiliar with the neighborhood will have heard of it: the restaurant that makes pies out of human meat.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Hsssh… Really don’t get why she has to be the one our establishment’s named after.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Hey, don’t you think so too? My work’s vital in every step—from procuring ingredients to cutting, trimming, and preparing the meat. So why can’t my name be hung out?
Light taps with the back of an old cleaver.
The child pours out his complaints, poking his nervous prey on the shoulder.
C-Certainly! You deserve to be in the restaurant’s name, sir!

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Psh, don’t be like that. Quite a sharp turn from calling me bastard… That sudden “sir” gives me the jeebies.
M-My apologies!

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: …No need to be sorry. Not gonna make me let you go, y’know.
S-Sir! If you’re that sure about your abilities, then you should kill whoever’s put her name forward and rightfully take her spot! I—I can help…

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Ah geez, you’re awfully noisy.
The conversation ended there, and the room was filled with sounds of chopping and slicing.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Well… I appreciate the nice words, pal. But I can’t make pasty hand pies out of flattery.
The child mutters, his hands busy with the sloppy lumps.
There was no one to hear him now, though.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: Sure, she gets on my nerves and threatens to fire me all the time…

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: But, she’s not a bad cook to learn from… I gotta behave for now. Just for now.

dataList.title: District 23 Backstreets
dataList.content: So don’t be too sullen, pal. I might’ve hesitated if you were a distinguished chef. Heh.
If the child is biding his time, what does he plan to do down the line? It’s a curious thing to think about…
Yet, this doesn’t seem like the right time to be idly wondering about such things. Right?
